game.name: FamCram
game.categories: Single-player, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: FamCram is a 3D grid-based puzzle game about two dads putting their kids to bed. Guide the children through increasingly challenging and multicultural settings, each with unique items, mechanics, and humor.
game.shortDescriptionEn: FamCram is a 3D grid-based puzzle game about two dads putting their kids to bed. Guide the children through increasingly challenging and multicultural settings, each with unique items, mechanics, and humor.
